name: Shop The Local Brand: The Fashion & The Food
description: In the past 5 years, the local fashion scene is getting bigger and more creative. A marriage of modern design and traditional heritage creates new statements in the fashion industry. Through this trip, you can enjoy shopping and find treasured things that are crafted and unique from your trip. You will go around the city and explore boutique cum cafe shops to some retail spaces that bring together many aspiring young designers. The labels that you will see are the mid-upper priced collections.
